channel.title: [pi] boss respawn
channel.description:
this is what i have in npc handler:
[code] public int getRespawnTime(int i) { switch(npcs[i].npcType) { case 6260: case 6247: case 6222: return 1000; [/code] there are alot more but they are not important no matter what the return is the respawn allways stays at around 15 seconds... anyone know wtf is up?

			return 1000;

there are alot more but they are not important no matter what the return is the respawn allways stays at around 15 secondsâ€¦
